description: Housing 2000 offers a semi-detached house for sale in an area very close to the main street of the town. The house is accessed through a front terrace. On the main floor we have a beautiful kitchen built with granite countertops and a good gas stove with a large oven, for those who enjoy cooking. The kitchen has two corner windows and with its south orientation, makes this area very bright. We have a guest toilet and the living-dining room, with its square layout, allows for easy layout. From the living room we have access to the garden. On the upper floor we have the sleeping area. The two secondary bedrooms overlook the garden area of the house, which due to its orientation, allows for beautiful views. The master bedroom stands out for its spaciousness, which allows it to have a large area of fully dressed closets. The two windows in this room are large, facing the sea, one is a balcony type, and from the other, we have access to a pleasant terrace. All bedrooms share a renovated bathroom, with a large shower tray. The garden area is ideal, since, compared to other homes in the same area, this one does not have a home in front, which gives a feeling of spaciousness. The garden has been designed for easy maintenance, with most of it paved and the entire perimeter with planters, very well cared for. The house has a garage with capacity for one car, it has an automatic door, and from inside, we have access to the front terrace of the house. The chalet has dimensions of about 130 meters. In addition, a basement of about 40 meters has been built into the house. Ideal as a second living room, leisure area or storage room. The house is kept in good condition, with natural gas heating, air conditioning in the living room and master bedroom, and air conditioning and heat pump in the secondary bedrooms. Its PVC windows are foldable and the access door to the house is armored. It has no community fees and is located near the municipal swimming pool and commercial area, being a quiet area at the same time. Don't miss the opportunity. No fees to the purchasing party.

Housing 2000 sells semi-detached house in the center of the town. The house is characterized by its dimensions, distributed as follows: - main floor: we access the house through its front terrace. On this floor we find as soon as we enter a room equipped as a living room, a guest toilet, a large kitchen with a large capacity of cabinets and with direct access to the living-dining room, which is large in size, has a fireplace with a cassette and access to the rear garden. of the house. The garden is mostly paved, with an area prepared for landscaping. From this area we have access to the community area, where we have gardens and a large swimming pool. -First floor: we have 4 bedrooms with built-in wardrobes, 2 full bathrooms, one inside the master bedroom. On this floor there are also two terraces, one very large in a secondary room, and the other, smaller in size in the master bedroom, but with beautiful views of the common areas. - Attic: this area is completely open plan, it can be used as a fifth bedroom. - Basement: with a very useful layout, we have a garage for two cars, laundry room with built-in wardrobe and sauna, storage room, wine cellar, another room equipped as a gym, and finally, another complete bathroom. The house is in good condition, located in the center of San Agustín, but at the same time in a very quiet area. It has a very good orientation, so the house is sunny in the morning in one area, and in the afternoon, in the back. Its community is ideal because of how quiet it is and its green areas are perfect for your enjoyment.

Renovated house in San Agustín de Guadalix Beautiful residence in the heart of San Agustín de Guadalix, completely renovated with a covered garage and private patio. Upon entering, the first thing that catches your attention is its impressive spaciousness and brightness. To the left, you'll find a versatile living room that is currently used as an office and guest bedroom. On this same main floor, there is a complete bathroom with a shower, as well as a separate laundry room. The fantastic open-concept living-dining room and kitchen, expanded during the renovation, is characterized by its high ceilings and exposed beam, adding a distinctive touch. This space includes a cozy, efficient design fireplace that evenly distributes heat throughout the ground floor and provides access to a private patio of approximately 65 square meters, with artificial turf-covered flooring, a perfect place for family and social gatherings outdoors, adding significant value to this home. The modern fully equipped kitchen with an Italian granite countertop offers ample storage space and features a central island. From this area, you can access the spacious covered garage with space for one vehicle and a dedicated storage area. Moving up to the second floor, you'll find three spacious bedrooms, all of them with built-in closets and balconies. Additionally, on this floor, there is a spacious full bathroom with a shower that the bedrooms share. The floors are covered with gray-toned click vinyl flooring, an ideal choice for those who want to combine the elegance of wood with durability and ease of maintenance. Heating is provided by a heat pump, and there is air conditioning (A/C) in all rooms. The space under the stairs has been utilized to create a room that could be used as a storage area. In summary, this property is characterized by its comfort, spaciousness, brightness, and above all, its exceptional location in the center of San Agustín de Guadalix. It's worth mentioning the potential that the possibility of adding an additional floor offers if needed. San Agustín de Guadalix is located in the Community of Madrid, one of the 17 autonomous regions of Spain. This municipality is situated in the northern region of the Community of Madrid, near the Sierra de Guadarrama, a significant mountain range in the area. It is approximately 34 kilometers north of the center of Madrid, making it a suburb on the outskirts of the capital. San Agustín de Guadalix shares borders with several municipalities, including Colmenar Viejo to the west, Tres Cantos to the east, and Manzanares el Real to the north, among others. Access to this municipality is possible via important roads such as the A-1, which connects it to both the city of Madrid and neighboring municipalities, as well as the M-607. It also has direct bus routes that reach Plaza Castilla in about 35-40 minutes. In summary, San Agustín de Guadalix is a municipality located in the northern part of the Community of Madrid, near the capital, surrounded by other municipalities and stunning natural landscapes like the Sierra de Guadarrama.

description: EXCLUSIVE PROMOTION IN SAN AGUSTIN DEL GUADALIX Montevirey presents its new promotion in San Agustín del Guadalix. The project is made up of 33 homes with 3 and 4 bedrooms.Ground floors with a large garden and dream penthouses, all homes with terraces. The urbanization has a swimming pool and a gym equipped with a sauna.The houses have two parking spaces and a storage room included in the price. The houses are equipped with the latest technology in air conditioning systems, Aerothermal with hot underfloor heating in winter and cooling floor in summer. The elegant and modern design of the urbanization, together with the development of the project in search of maximum energy efficiency through the equipment of the building, make Residencial Moncalvillo II the best choice to enjoy your new home. Exclusive area for location and tranquility with bus service just 5 minutes walk away, close to all services (supermarkets, study centers, nursery schools, health center...) The homes include a fully furnished kitchen with electrical appliances, where quality is present in all its finishes. PRICE WITHOUT VAT.

"My Project" sells a FULLY RENOVATED exterior apartment, on the third floor, consisting of a large, very bright living room, with a terrace, kitchen, two large bedrooms and a full bathroom. The apartment belongs to a community of neighbors, which is in excellent condition.It has free parking areas, which allows you to enter with several cars, including those for visitors. In addition, the Community has a beautiful and very large swimming pool, in a common area with grass. It is located in a commercial area, with all the services at your disposal, surrounded by shops, banks, supermarkets, schools, institutes, pharmacies and a health center. The apartment is located on Avenida Madrid (main avenue of San Agustín de Guadalix), next to the bus stop and a few meters from the exit to the A1. For those who don't know, San Agustín de Guadalix is ​​located in the Community of Madrid, one of the 17 autonomous regions of Spain. This municipality is located in the northern region of the Community of Madrid, in the vicinity of the Sierra de Guadarrama, a relevant mountain range in the area.It is located 34 kilometers north of the center of Madrid, which makes it an enclave on the outskirts of the capital. San Agustín de Guadalix borders several municipalities, including Colmenar Viejo to the west, Tres Cantos to the east, and Manzanares el Real to the north among others. Access to this municipality is possible through important roads such as the A-1, which connects it both with the city of Madrid and with other nearby municipalities, in addition to the M-607.It also has direct bus routes that reach Plaza Castilla in about 35-40 minutes.It is located 16 km from San Sebastián de los Reyes (area of ​​important shopping centers such as IKEA, Leroy Merlín, Plaza Norte 2, Decathlon, etc.) and 21 km from Alcobendas. In summary, San Agustín de Guadalix is ​​a municipality located in the northern area of ​​the Community of Madrid, near the capital, surrounded by other municipalities and impressive natural landscapes such as the Sierra de Guadarrama.

Large semi-detached single-family home of 190 m2 for sale. It consists of 5 floors and is located in a private community in San Agustín del Guadalix, just 20 minutes from Madrid capital. It is sold fully furnished and ready to move into. The main floor has a separate, spacious and bright kitchen. In addition, it has a large front terrace and a living room with a fireplace, decorated with very good taste. In the entrance hall there is a built-in wardrobe and in the living room there is a beautiful skylight and high ceilings. On the upper floor is the master bedroom with a built-in wardrobe and an en-suite bathroom with a bathtub. The staircase goes down to two large bedrooms with built-in wardrobes and a full bathroom with a bathtub. On the ground floor, there is a dressing room and a bedroom/multipurpose room. In addition, the house has a gym on the lowest floor. It has individual natural gas heating and a beautiful wooden floor in the living room. Includes garage space with car wash. The residential has beautiful and well-kept gardens. Magnificent opportunity with direct access via the A1.

description: Housing located in the "Urbanization Navalazarza II", in the municipality of San Agustín del Guadalix, a municipality that has all kinds of services, shops, bilingual schools and institute. Municipality with good communication by public transport with several intercity bus lines and night line. It has good communication by highway A1 and M 104. The chalet consists of 240 m2 built, distributed over three floors, on the ground or main floor we find the hall, a large 11 m2 furnished kitchen, a living-dining room with direct access to a 45 m2 terrace and garden, a bathroom with a bathtub and Finally we find on this same floor the garage of 20 m2. First floor; In this area of the house we have 4 double bedrooms with built-in wardrobes, the main one being en-suite with a complete bathroom and a hydromassage bathtub and apart from this there is another bathroom with a shower tray shared with the rest of the bedrooms. Basement; On this floor is the laundry and ironing room, a storage room, a room of about 20 m2 attached to the cellar area with almost 20 m2 with a bar, refrigerator, etc. , with natural ventilation, ideal for gatherings with family and friends. The house has an east orientation in the living room and garden area and west in the entrance and kitchen area, so you can enjoy direct sun almost all hours of the day. The property is in perfect condition and has individual Natural Gas heating, PVC tilt-and-turn climalit windows, smooth paint walls, oak and stoneware parquet floors and oak doors. The property is located in a very quiet area of the town, next to bus stops and close to shops and services. The urbanization has a communal swimming pool.   For more information or to make a visit, do not hesitate to contact us at or via email sanagustí.

Well-preserved apartment in a gated community with common areas, in San Agustín de Guadalix. It is the third and last floor with a south-west exterior orientation and also has light space on the north side. Although it is the last floor, the summer heat is not noticeable because the attic area of the building has a good chamber and is high before reaching the roof, in addition to having the terrace closed and well protected with good climalit windows and special shutters; in fact, their owners do not need air conditioning. Comfortable entrance to the urbanization with outdoor community parking, wide entrance to the block with a small storage room and community bicycle room. The apartment consists of a kitchen as soon as you enter on the right with a utility area or pantry, a living-dining room with access to the covered terrace and views (the terrace being so long allows it to be used for various purposes); Distributor corridor with three bedrooms, bathroom and toilet. The house, although it is well preserved, would need, at least, to change the light box and some retouching. If it is an investment to rent, it is good enough to move into. In the common areas there are tennis courts, soccer, playground, swimming pool and a good garden area. Community expenses are an average of 140 euros per month but water and heating enter; although it is true that it will become an individual accountant by law. The annual IBI expenses about 300 euros. There is the possibility of subrogating to the mortgage with good conditions. "THERE ARE NO AGENCY FEES".

Tecnocasa San Agustín del Guadalix sells an exclusive 290m2 SEMI-DETACHED VILLA built on a CORNER, which gives it greater privacy and luminosity. The house was built in 2005. AWA PROPERTIES presents this impressive independent residence on a 200,000m² plot in San Agustín de Guadalix. It is an imposing residence of excellent construction on a 20-HECTARE plot.The large house covers 1,100 m² of construction, as well as a garage, porches, terraces and an extensive garden with a swimming pool, a tennis court and a separate social area. This magnificent home has a total of 8 bedrooms (5 of them en suite), two service bedrooms and 7 bathrooms.In addition, it has various facilities such as a billiard room, large dining room for daily use with fireplace, magnificent living room with social area and main dining room, among many other rooms. The property has a total of 3 fireplaces (main bedroom, social room and dining room for daily use). The main floor of the house is distributed in a reception area with a large and elegant hall, which leads to a spacious living room with three different spaces and a fireplace, as well as a separate dining room. These spaces are equipped with beautiful glass windows that go from floor to ceiling, offering views of the garden and creating a very bright atmosphere. The main floor also has a living room and library area, two guest bedrooms (one of them en suite), a guest toilet, a porch with a summer dining room and panoramic views, a large kitchen with an office area. and a daily dining room with fireplace. The large main room, located on the main floor, has a fireplace and built-in living room.In addition, with its en-suite bathroom and huge windows, creating a very bright atmosphere. At the other end of the floor, there is a large service area with two bedrooms and a bathroom.There is also an ironing and laundry area. On the second floor there is another living room and three large bedrooms (2 of them en suite) with large dressing rooms and equipped bathrooms.These bedrooms have access to two large terraces and a solarium with views of the garden. The property has a large storage area and a garage with capacity for five cars. The extensive tree-lined garden has a generous swimming pool over which wonderful views can be enjoyed.In the same area is the barbecue with beautiful outdoor dining space, toilets and storage rooms.Next is the tennis court. Additionally, it has another independent guard house. The house has central heating and water from its own well. Very close to San Agustín de Guadalix, well connected to Madrid by the N-I with all kinds of services and commercial areas.
